title: Leah Messenger Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Leah Messenger? Check out all of Leah Messenger's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogLeah Messenger Senior Content Marketing Manager Leah Messenger Leah is the Senior Content Marketing Manager for the Digital Marketing Intelligence platform at Similarweb. With a strong focus in content writing throughout her marketing career, she has a passion for turning complex (and sometimes even ‘boring’) topics into educational, engaging, and entertaining content. If you’re looking for Leah outside of work, you’ll probably find her exploring the pubs or local hikes in and around London, or in the greenery of her family home in Somerset with her parents’ dog, Peggy.
